config.Giant Flower Chance.name: Giant Flower Chance
config.Giant Flower Chance.description: Chance of getting a giant flower from any vanilla growable flower. Values: 'very high' - 5%, 'high' - 1% (game default), 'medium' - 0.5%, 'low' - 0.1%, 'off' - 0%.
config.Sprite Set.name: Sprite Set
config.Sprite Set.description: Which set of sprites are used for the giant flowers.
config.Minimum Drops.name: Minimum Drops
config.Minimum Drops.description: Minimum amount of flowers (and sunflower seeds) dropped when breaking a giant flower. Default: 21
config.Maximum Drops.name: Maximum Drops
config.Maximum Drops.description: Maximum amount of flowers (and sunflower seeds) dropped when breaking a giant flower. Default: 30
config.section.Flowers.name: Flowers
config.Tulip.name: Tulip
config.Blue Jazz.name: Blue Jazz
config.Summer Spangle.name: Summer Spangle
config.Poppy.name: Poppy
config.Sunflower.name: Sunflower
config.Fairy Rose.name: Fairy Rose
